title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 132 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 132 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Lord, remember David, and all his afflictions:
lineList.cn: （上行之诗）耶和华阿，求你记念大卫所受的一切苦难。

lineList.en: How he sware unto the LORD, and vowed unto the mighty God of Jacob;
lineList.cn: 他怎样向耶和华起誓，向雅各的大能者许愿，

lineList.en: Surely I will not come into the tabernacle of my house, nor go up into my bed;
lineList.cn: 说，我必不进我的帐幕，也不上我的床榻。

lineList.en: I will not give sleep to mine eyes, or slumber to mine eyelids,
lineList.cn: 我不容我的眼睛睡觉，也不容我的眼目打盹。

lineList.en: Until I find out a place for the LORD, an habitation for the mighty God of Jacob.
lineList.cn: 直等我为耶和华寻得所在，为雅各的大能者寻得居所。

lineList.en: Lo, we heard of it at Ephratah: we found it in the fields of the wood.
lineList.cn: 我们听说约柜在以法他，我们在基列耶琳就寻见了。

lineList.en: We will go into his tabernacles: we will worship at his footstool.
lineList.cn: 我们要进他的居所，在他脚凳前下拜。

lineList.en: Arise, O LORD, into thy rest; thou, and the ark of thy strength.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你兴起，和你有能力的约柜同入安息之所。

lineList.en: Let thy priests be clothed with righteousness; and let thy saints shout for joy.
lineList.cn: 愿你的祭司披上公义。愿你的圣民欢呼。

lineList.en: For thy servant David's sake turn not away the face of thine anointed.
lineList.cn: 求你因你仆人大卫的缘故，不要厌弃你的受膏者。

lineList.en: The LORD hath sworn in truth unto David; he will not turn from it; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.
lineList.cn: 耶和华向大卫，凭诚实起了誓，必不反覆，说，我要使你所生的坐在你的宝座上。

lineList.en: If thy children will keep my covenant and my testimony that I shall teach them, their children shall also sit upon thy throne for evermore.
lineList.cn: 你的众子若守我的约，和我所教训他们的法度，他们的子孙，必永远坐在你的宝座上。

lineList.en: For the LORD hath chosen Zion; he hath desired it for his habitation.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华拣选了锡安，愿意当作自己的居所，

lineList.en: This is my rest for ever: here will I dwell; for I have desired it.
lineList.cn: 说，这是我永远安息之所。我要住在这里，因为是我所愿意的。

lineList.en: I will abundantly bless her provision: I will satisfy her poor with bread.
lineList.cn: 我要使其中的粮食丰满，使其中的穷人饱足。

lineList.en: I will also clothe her priests with salvation: and her saints shall shout aloud for joy.
lineList.cn: 我要使祭司披上救恩，圣民大声欢呼。

lineList.en: There will I make the horn of David to bud: I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed.
lineList.cn: 我要叫大卫的角，在那里发生。我为我的受膏者，预备明灯。

lineList.en: His enemies will I clothe with shame: but upon himself shall his crown flourish.
lineList.cn: 我要使他的仇敌披上羞耻。但他的冠冕，要在头上发光。
